ie.gmit.sw.api.similarity.indexes

Class JaacardIndex

  • Object
    • JaacardIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityIndex

    public class JaacardIndex
extends Object
implements SimilarityIndex
    The type Jaacard index. Implements SimilarityIndex. Can compute the Jaacard Index of 2 or more provided Documents.

        public JaacardIndex(Shinglizer shinglizer,
                    int numHashes)
        Instantiates a new JaacardIndex.
        Parameters:
        shinglizer - the shinglizer which will be used to break documents into shingles.
        numHashes - the number of hashes that will be used in the min hash algorithm.

      • shinglize

        private List<ShinglizeResult> shinglize(List<Document> documents)
        Takes a List of documents and breaks up each document into a List of shingles in a separate thread. Each is converted into a ShinglizeResult
        Parameters:
        documents - the documents to be broken up into shingles.
        Returns:
        a List of ShinglizeResults

      • startMinHashTasks

        private List<Future<MinHashResult>> startMinHashTasks(List<ShinglizeResult> shinglizeResults,
                                                      Collection<Integer> hashes)
        Takes a list of ShinglizeResults and a Set of hashes and creates a list of MinHashResult futures which are used to calculate the Jaacard Index.
        Parameters:
        shinglizeResults - the list of ShinglizeResults that are used to compute MinHashResults
        hashes - the hashes used in the minhash algorithm.
        Returns:
        a list of MinHashResult futures.

      • makeMinHash

        private MinHash makeMinHash(Pair<ShinglizeResult,Integer> pair)
        Helper construction method which takes a Pair of ShinglizeResult and Integer and creates a MinHash.
        Parameters:
        pair - of type ShinglizeResult and Integer
        Returns:
        MinHash created from the pair.

      • constructMinHashResultsMap

        private Map<Integer,Collection<Integer>> constructMinHashResultsMap(List<Future<MinHashResult>> futures)
        This method takes the list of MinHashResult futures and builds up a map of the results with the Document Integer ID as the key and a collection of integers as the value. The collection of integers are the min hash results for that Document.
        Parameters:
        futures - the MinHashFutures created by startMinHashTasks(List, Collection)
        Returns:
        A map of Document to Collection of integers. Where the integers are the min hash results for the corresponding document.

      • calculateMinHashResults

        private Map<Integer,Collection<Integer>> calculateMinHashResults(List<ShinglizeResult> shinglizeResults)
        This method takes the result of all the shinglized Documents and returns a map with the results of the min hash algorithm per Document.
        Parameters:
        shinglizeResults - the result of a call to shinglize(List)
        Returns:
        The map of document to collection of min hash results.

      • computeIndex

        public double computeIndex(List<Document> documents)
        Computes the Jaacard Index of 2 or more Documents. The Jaacard Index will be between 0 and 1 and is a measure of Document similarity.
        Specified by:
        computeIndex in interface SimilarityIndex
        Parameters:
        documents - the documents to compute the Jaacard index of.
        Returns:
        the Jaacard index of all the provided documents.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if fewer than 2 documents are provided.
